item.title: This 1 Trick Will Change the Way You Record Video on Your iPhone - Plus, Learn How to Add Music!
item.description: Introduction Are you looking for a way to take your iPhone video recordings to the next level? Look no further! This one trick will allow you to record better video on your iPhone and learn how to add music to it. Read on to find out more! Overview of the Trick The trick is to use the iPhone’s built-in camera app to record video. By using the app, you can adjust the settings to get the best possible quality for your video.
